description: For a hearty soup to warm you up on cooler nights, try this healthier, vegan slow-cooked minestrone soup recipe.
name: Healthier Slow-Cooked Minestrone Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
425 g can Macro Organic no-added-salt chickpeas
450 g Macro Organic frozen cut green beans
1.5 cups Macro Organic wholemeal pasta spirals

recipeInstructions.text: Add zucchini, green beans and wholemeal pasta. Increase heat to high. Cook for a further 1 hour or until pasta and zucchini are tender. Season. Serve soup topped with extra parsley.
